name: Status Report
description: Report player capacity status via persona button

range_0_10.message: [Player] reports feeling completely empty and deflated, almost hollow inside.

range_11_20.message: [Player] admits to feeling the first hints of pressure building, a subtle tightness beginning.

range_21_30.message: [Player] confesses the swelling is becoming noticeable now, breathing a little harder.

range_31_40.message: [Player] gasps that their belly is visibly distended, the pressure mounting steadily.

range_41_50.message: [Player] whimpers that they're halfway to capacity, skin growing taut and sensitive.

range_51_60.message: [Player] moans that the pressure is becoming overwhelming, each breath labored.

range_61_70.message: [Player] pleads that they're so full it's almost unbearable, stretched to their limits.

range_71_80.message: [Player] cries out that their capacity is nearly maxed, every sensation amplified.

range_81_90.message: [Player] desperately reports they're approaching critical fullness, barely able to speak.

range_91_100.message: [Player] gasps that they've reached absolute maximum capacity, completely overwhelmed.

range_over_100.message: [Player] whimpers in disbelief that they've exceeded all known limits, body trembling.

range_0_10.message: [Char] clinically notes [Player]'s baseline state, documenting zero distension and normal respiration.

range_11_20.message: [Char] observes and records the initial signs of inflation in [Player], noting early pressure indicators.

range_21_30.message: [Char] measures [Player]'s visible distension, clinically assessing the rate of expansion.

range_31_40.message: [Char] documents [Player]'s progressing inflation, noting abdominal circumference increase.

range_41_50.message: [Char] records [Player] reaching the midpoint threshold, observing skin elasticity response.

range_51_60.message: [Char] monitors [Player]'s elevated pressure readings, documenting respiratory changes.

range_61_70.message: [Char] notes [Player]'s approach to upper capacity limits, assessing physiological stress markers.

range_71_80.message: [Char] clinically observes [Player]'s near-maximum distension, recording all vital indicators.

range_81_90.message: [Char] documents [Player]'s critical capacity status, monitoring for threshold breach.

range_91_100.message: [Char] confirms [Player] has achieved maximum recorded capacity, all readings at peak levels.

range_over_100.message: [Char] records unprecedented capacity breach in [Player], documenting extraordinary physiological state.
